roleset.name: beat soundly
roleset.note: CREAM-V NOTES: Not sure if the active could occur, actually. (from cream.01-v)

example.name: passive = adjective
example.text: He adds: ``The junk market has witnessed some trouble and now some people think that if [the equity market]-1 gets creamed [*-1]that means the economy will be terrible and that's bad for junk.

roleset.name: cook with/in cream
roleset.note: CREAM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'cream' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from cream.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: mmm, now that's fine dining
example.text: John creamed some weenies for Thanksgiving dinner.
